ref: 6723 dhanīyā f. ʻ covetousness ʼ lex. [Like dhánaka -- m. ʻ id. ʼ Pāṇ. deriv. of dhanāyati ʻ prospers ʼ VS., ʻ seeks (obj. dhanam) ʼ Kir., ˚tē ʻ seeks wealth ʼ MBh., dhanīyati ʻ id. ʼ Pāṇ.com., Pa. dhanāyati ʻ desires ʼ. -- dhána -- ]
M. dhaṇī f. ʻ desire, craving, satiety ʼ; -- or poss. with
Pk. dhaṇi -- f. ʻ satisfaction ʼ < *dhr̥ṇi -- : dhrā́yati.
